trans-unit.target: TEXT_SUBSEA068_00480_SEQ_00<tab>Moegramm doesn't know what to do about his dodos.
TEXT_SUBSEA068_00480_SEQ_01<tab>Dodos have escaped from their pen at the Red Rooster Stead. Speak with X'payan if you would help to bring them back.
TEXT_SUBSEA068_00480_SEQ_02<tab>Domesticated dodos are docile creatures that wouldn't dare wander into the wild. Find the bolting dodos on the Stead and capture them in the dodo-sized sacks.
TEXT_SUBSEA068_00480_SEQ_03<tab>You have caught all the escaped birds. Take the dodo-filled sacks back to Moegramm.
TEXT_SUBSEA068_00480_SEQ_04<tab>With the restoration of his beloved dodos, Moegramm discovers a newfound love for capable adventurers.
TEXT_SUBSEA068_00480_TODO_01<tab>Capture the bolting dodos with the dodo-sized sacks.
TEXT_SUBSEA068_00480_TODO_02<tab>Deliver the filled dodo-sized sacks to Moegramm.
TEXT_SUBSEA068_00480_MOEGRAMM_000_0<tab>They may call it the “Red Rooster” Stead, but make no mistake─dodos are the birds that keep this stead steady.
TEXT_SUBSEA068_00480_MOEGRAMM_000_1<tab>Those sweet and tender eggs! That succulent meat! So long as you remove a dodoling's poison glands, you're in for some scrumptious and healthy poultry.

TEXT_SUBSEA068_00480_MOEGRAMM_000_2<tab>They're so delicious, I have to remind myself some birds just aren't meant to be caged. Or perhaps I don't. Talk to X'payan and see if we can't return those exquisite creatures to their pen.
TEXT_SUBSEA068_00480_XPAYAN_000_10<tab>Am I ever pleased to see you! I was about to cry “fowl,” but with your help we can round them up.
TEXT_SUBSEA068_00480_XPAYAN_000_11<tab>Those dim-witted dodos pecked through the fencing and flew the coop! Er, fled the coop. Luckily, they know better than to leave the Stead.
TEXT_SUBSEA068_00480_XPAYAN_000_12<tab>There are three bolting dodos in all. If you spot one, just throw one of these dodo-sized sacks over its head.

TEXT_SUBSEA068_00480_XPAYAN_000_13<tab>Once you've caught all the birds, would you mind leaving them in Moegramm's care? I need to repair the fencing before we can return them to this enclosure, you see.
TEXT_SUBSEA068_00480_MOEGRAMM_000_30<tab>I've heard everything! Hand me the dodos!
TEXT_SUBSEA068_00480_MOEGRAMM_000_31<tab>Oh, my precious darlings! Without their poison breath, they're defenseless out in the wild! Daddy dodo gets so worried...
TEXT_SUBSEA068_00480_MOEGRAMM_000_32<tab>And now my dodos have <var 08 E905 ((a mommy)) ((another daddy)) /var>!
TEXT_SUBSEA068_00480_MOEGRAMM_000_33<tab>You'll stay around and look after my babies, won't you? At least until they're ripe for slaughter?
